text: "No More Tears" is a song by French house duo Modjo. It was released in January 2002 as the fourth single from their debut studio album, Modjo. ==Track listings== #"No More Tears" (radio edit) #"No More Tears" (Step/House Mix by Play Paul) #"No More Tears" (Wuz Remix By Alex Gopher) #"No More Tears" (album version) ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2002) !align="center"|Peak position |- |align="left"|Romania (Romanian Top 100) |align="center"|66 |- |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 songs Category:2002 singles Category:Modjo songs Category:PolyGram singles Category:House music songs
title: No More Tears (Modjo song)
